channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In just 15 years, the average U.S. homebuyer went from 39 to 59 years old: Top analyst reveals how the housing market has warped in one generation
item.description: The first-time homebuyer just hit 40 years old for the first time ever, but the average homebuyer is nearly a senior citizen.

item.title: The longest government shutdown in history is over—but flights and jobs data won’t return to normalcy yet
item.description: The House passed a bill last night to fund the government through Jan. 30, and President Trump signed it, reopening the federal government.

item.title: MacKenzie Scott makes more ‘life-changing,’ record-breaking gifts to historically Black colleges and universities—totaling more than $400 million
item.description: These donations come on the heels of other major donations from Scott to HBCUs this fall.

item.title: Democratic senator calls for 'more effective leadership' as Schumer faces mounting pressure

item.title: Calling It ‘Biden’s FBI’ Diminishes The Real Threat Of A Bureaucracy Gone Wild
item.description: The corruption didn’t begin under Biden, and it won’t end under a Republican administration.

item.title: This Time, It’s the Populists Who Are Underestimating Trump
item.description: The idea that another candidate can win in 2028 with a purer version of Buchananism ignores the president’s actual appeal.

item.title: Happy 250th Birthday to the Few, the Proud, the Marines
item.description: America’s unique land, air, and sea force has a glorious history, and artists have taken note.

item.title: BofA cites ‘favorable protein economics’ in the chicken restaurant segment with the race afoot to corner the $67 billion market

item.title: State Department makes first-ever Antifa foreign terrorist designations across Europe
item.description: State Department makes historic move designating four European Antifa groups as foreign terrorist organizations for first time in U.S. history.

item.title: Don’t Bet the House on the 50-Year Mortgage
item.description: President Trump’s proposed reform would be a terrible deal for homebuyers and taxpayers alike.

item.title: Sorry, Ladies, Radical Politicians Such As Mamdani Are No Substitute For A Husband
item.description: The young feminists who helped elect Zohran Mamdani would rather have apartments and pets than houses and families.

item.title: To Resolve Biden’s Border Crisis, Red States Need To Require All Police To Help Deport Illegals
item.description: Every law enforcement agency in every red state should take part in the 287(g) program.

item.title: Fighting to Preserve the American Experiment
item.description: The conservative movement is needed today more than ever, especially as the alternatives fail.

item.title: Self-made millionaire Barbara Corcoran reveals her ‘golden rule’ of real estate investing
item.description: The “Shark Tank” star with a $100 million net worth says paying 20% down is key—and explains why.

item.title: Why Trump’s National Archivist Nomination Is The Most Important Job You’ve Never Heard Of
item.description: The archivist of the United States has become responsible for overseeing the digital infrastructure of the entire federal government.
